ComicInfo.Title: Acts of Destruction; Judgement--and Lament!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Acts of Destruction: Moondragon decides she wants to try to understand Drax the Destroyer since he has the remains of her fathers soul inside him. When she finds Drax unconscious after being attacked by aliens she takes him to Avengers Mansion, where Thor happens to be visiting. Drax, controlled by the alien, goes on a rampage that must be stopped by Thor.
Judgement--and Lament!: Odin retakes Valhalla from Hela.
